name: Cursors - Hover File Hyperlinks
description:
A cursor indicator for hyperlinks of file extension.

Test page for all cursors: http://pastehtml.com/view/b82034l1c.html
New and all cursors: https://www.dropbox.com/s/dlfdyxn01mnf3pd/cursors.html
additional_info:
Based on:
 - Hover Cursor - another cursor (http://userstyles.org/styles/8208)
 - Cursors for hyperlinks (https://userstyles.org/styles/108888/cursors-for-hyperlinks)

style_setting_options.label: Yes
Yes
Yes
Yes
style_setting_options.value:
a[href$=".zip"]:hover, a[href$=".rar"]:hover, a[href$=".cbr"]:hover, a[href$=".f"]:hover, a[href$=".cab"]:hover, a[href$=".arj"]:hover, a[href$=".lzh"]:hover, a[href$=".tar"]:hover, a[href$=".gz"]:hover, a[href$=".bz2"]:hover, a[href$=".ace"]:hover, a[href$=".uue"]:hover, a[href$=".jar"]:hover, a[href$=".7z"]:hover, a[href$=".gzip"]:hover, a[href$=".j"]:hover, a[href$=".tgz"]:hover, a[href$=".war"]:hover, a[href$=".y"]:hover, a[href$=".yz"]:hover, a[href$=".z"]:hover, a[href$=".sit"]:hover { cursor:url("data:image/png;base64,"), pointer; }
a[href$=".exe"]:hover, a[href$=".bin"]:hover, a[href$=".elf"]:hover, a[href$=".msi"]:hover { cursor:url("data:image/png;base64,"), pointer; }
